member.name: T:DND_HP.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:DND_HP.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:DND_HP.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:DND_HP.My.Resources.Resources._1stspell_lib
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Absorb Elements:1st Level Absorb Elements-Land:Defense Absorb Elements-Damage:Resistance Then^1d6 Elemental Absorb Elements-Info:Reaction;S;1 Round;Self Absorb Elements-LongInfo:1st-level abjuration^^The spell captures some of the incoming energy, lessening its effect on you and storing it for your next melee attack. You have resistance to the triggering damage type until the start of your next turn. Also, the first time you hit with a melee attack on your next turn, the target takes an extra 1d6 damage [rest of string was truncated]";.
